main event: Three unidentified flying objects were observed in a reverse triangular formation in Detroit, Michigan, on March 3, 1967.
interesting points: The objects varied in brightness and color, changing speed and course during observation., The sighting lasted for about 4 to 5 minutes., The objects were reported to be in an erratic flight path before disappearing instantaneously to the North., There was a Lake Central Airlines plane crash reported at Detroit City Airport just before the sighting., The investigation suggested that the reporting person's account may have been influenced by the nearby aircraft crash.
sighted object: three unidentified flying objects in a reverse triangular formation
